sections.description: A WordPress plugin that detects mobile devices and shows appropriate app store links or opens the app if it's installed.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to your WordPress site's `/wp-content/plugins/app-detector/` directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
3. Go to Settings > App Detector to configure your app settings
sections.changelog:
## Version 1.0.2
- Fixed mobile device detection issues
- Improved async/await implementation
- Enhanced error handling
- Better compatibility with modern mobile browsers

## Version 1.0.1
- Added version control system
- Implemented session-based popup dismissal
- Enhanced admin interface
- Added copyright and contact information

## Version 1.0.0
- Initial release
- Mobile device detection
- App installation detection
- Smart popup system
